description: This file defines API endpoints for user-related operations using FastAPI, including retrieving, updating, deleting, and listing users.

methods.name: User get_me(current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Returns the profile of the authenticated user.

methods.name: User update_me(payload: UserUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Updates the profile or password of the authenticated user.

methods.name: delete_me(db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
list[User] list_users(db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Lists all users, demo feature not access-restricted.

ctags.name: delete_me
ctags.pattern: /^def delete_me(db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user)):$/

ctags.name: repo_delete_user
ctags.pattern: /^from .repositories import list_users as repo_list_users, update_user as repo_update_user, delete/

ctags.name: repo_list_users
ctags.pattern: /^from .repositories import list_users as repo_list_users, update_user as repo_update_user, delete/

ctags.name: repo_update_user
ctags.pattern: /^from .repositories import list_users as repo_list_users, update_user as repo_update_user, delete/

ctags.name: update_me
ctags.pattern: /^def update_me(payload: UserUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(g/
ctags.signature: (payload: UserUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
